tips: Remeber to take breaks when coding!
Use === instead of == to avoid type coercion.
Declare variables with let and const, not var.
Use template literals for cleaner string formatting.
Use meaningful variable and function names!
Using console.log() is very helpful when testing your code!
Indent your code consistently so it is easy to read.
Write pseudo-code before coding to plan your logic.
Do not repeat yourself when coding.
